headline: The Hidden Costs of Heartbleed
keywords: OCSP, HTTPS, Heartbleed, Vulnerabilities, Reliability, SSL, OpenSSL, Security
description: A quick followup to our last blog post on our decision to reissue and revoke all of CloudFlare's customers' SSL certificates. One question we've received is why we didn't just reissue and revoke all SSL certificates as soon as we got word about the Heartbleed vulnerability?
